function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared personal comfort systems (PCS) in the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and infection if PCS are not properly managed or maintained.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of PCS, implementation of individualized PCS systems, and promotion of personal hygiene practices.","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection devices, touchless PCS controls, and antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Occupants in built environments with shared PCS, facility managers, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and public health authorities."}]}
